name: Monstera
description: Monstera plants are widely considered to be very beginner-friendly plants. Will grow to be quite large. Water every 1-2 weeks.

name: Peace Lily
description: The most temperamental drama queen. Will wilt if not watered consistently (at least once a week).

name: Cactus
description: Cacti can thrive in indoor environments with lots of sunlight. Water every 1-2 weeks in growing seasons, but in off-seasons, space it out to once every 3-4 weeks.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Grows very tall vertically, so keep that in mind when finding a place for this plant. Water when soil is completely dry.

name: Calathea Orbifolia
description: Needs well-draining but slightly acidic soil and bright but indirect light. Water once a week.
